Name: Stage Tepetl
Title: Stage Tepetl
Desc: "Get up on stage, and dance, dance, dance! Become a member of the Drillbit Dance! Show us your courage and resolve, and you can also become a legend of the stage!"

Talent.Name: Stage Tepetl
Talent.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After you play a card whose name was not in the initial deck at the start of the match:</color> This card gains 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Attention</color> point.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>After the opponent plays a card whose name was not in the initial deck at the start of the match:</color> This card loses 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Attention</color> point.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>When the Action Phase begins:</color> If this card has at least 3 points of <color=#FFFFFFFF>Attention</color>, then generate 1 random basic Elemental Die; and if this card has at least 1 point of <color=#FFFFFFFF>Attention</color>, convert 1 Elemental Die to an $[K411].

K411.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1111}Omni Element</color>
K411.Desc: The {SPRITE_PRESET#1111}Omni Element can be considered as any kind of element, and can be used to pay for costs of various kinds.
